body: We've got a little un-official Holiday Music event goin on at Avicus' PlugDJ! Since this is unofficial, you can play anything you want, but please play holiday music. Come join us!
body_tagged: We've got a little un-official Holiday Music event goin on at Avicus' PlugDJ! Since this is unofficial, you can play anything you want, but please play holiday music. Come join us!
title: Christmas Spirit on PlugDJ
